channel.title: I need help with commands!

item.title: I need help with commands!
item.dc:creator: @sigurd_03 sigurd 03
item.description:
@sigurd_03 wrote:

ok i did make custom commands and
i made pickup
::pure for admin+ got from allstarscape
and ::master also got from allstarscape

but pickup work but my other doesnt work
im using command maker

this code is pure

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(0, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("N33b!."); }
and master

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); addSkillXP(14910000, 3); addSkillXP(14910000, 4); addSkillXP(14910000, 5); addSkillXP(14910000, 6); addSkillXP(14910000, 7); addSkillXP(14910000, 8); addSkillXP(14910000, 9); addSkillXP(14910000, 10); addSkillXP(14910000, 11); addSkillXP(14910000, 12); addSkillXP(14910000, 13); addSkillXP(14910000, 14); addSkillXP(14910000, 15); addSkillXP(14910000, 16); addSkillXP(14910000, 17); addSkillXP(14910000, 18); addSkillXP(14910000, 19); addSkillXP(14910000, 20); addSkillXP(14910000, 21); addSkillXP(14910000, 22); addSkillXP(14910000, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. your a nerd."); }
but pickup work
but im gonna try this code but this is banuser

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("banuser") && playerRights >= 2) { appendToBanned(playerName); sendMessage("Player "+playerName+" has been banned."); }
and please give me unban and ipban
i dont know whats wrong
but please help
anyone know why?

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2009, 01:29:10 am[/size][hr]anyone know why it doesnt work?
